headline: Goldman Sachs upgrades NCLH, sees 'another stellar year for cruise'
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs is bullish on the cruise sector, forecasting a strong 2025 and upgrading Norwegian Cruise Line (NYSE:NCLH) Holdings to a Buy rating in a note Tuesday.

headline: Cruise Stocks Are Trouncing the S&P 500 This Year. Why That Is.
summary: Royal Caribbean Group  has soared 115%,  Carnival  has increased 54%, and  Norwegian Cruise Line  has gained 51% this year, analysts led by Lizzie Dove wrote on Tuesday.  The analysts believe gains in pricing are “driven by sustainable, structural changes in industry practices and ongoing incremental pricing tailwinds rather than pent-up consumer demand.”  “Amidst this backdrop, rather than selectively picking stocks, we argue for investors to own the sector,” the analysts wrote.
